name: EPC World Magazine
tag_list: construction, real-estate, aviation, infrastructure, transportation, railway-news
overview: EPC World Business and Infrastructure magazine published by EPC World Media group. It’s gives recent updates for construction news and projects information. EPC World Magazine top most business magazine and effective platform to reach out to main decision makers in construction industry. It is also provide different types of need such as Real estate and property news, telecom industry, Cement factory news, airport and aviation, Indian railway news, shipping logistic and transportation much more industrial news. Online Subscribe to EPC World magazine and receive the latest news from the construction industry delivered to your inbox visit http://www.epcworld.in/
